title: Yuen Ngai Fong
description: 緣藝坊 is a small take away shop with limited seating, but there is a little square with a couple of benches close by. No English spoken. Offers around 9 appetizers/snacks. One different noodle or rice dish per day during lunch/dinner - call ahead if you want that. Sells dried and frozen vegetarian products from Taiwan, Malaysia, and China.
